name: Battle Strike.io
description:
Destroy your opponents in this fun and futuristic multiplayer game.
Tap and drag your tank around to aim your cannon and release to fire at your enemies.
Create holes in the ground to drop your competitors in and size up! The bigger you get the easier it is to make them fall, but don't get trapped into a corner or fall yourself otherwise it's game over!

Battle Strike.io features:
- Fun and addictive gameplay
- Multiplayer battles
- Competitive levels
- Outstanding artwork
